/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the urban landscape. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, each with its own unique design and color scheme, contributing to the vibrant cityscape. Cars and pedestrians add life to the scene, suggesting a busy day in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of clouds, indicating a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
